name: The Last Life
description:
The Last Life is a top-down shooter with wave survival mechanics.

Story: 
In 2020 a zombie virus spread around the Earth, killing almost every living being there is...

You are a lone wolf, who spent the last 20 years surviving in this terrible environment. After a while all your supplies run out and you decide to go and look for a better place to stay. You decide that it's a good idea to pack all of your stuff with you and head out into the open world. After a while you find something you haven't seen in ages - a living tree! After that, you decide to protect this precious form of life with your own life and defend it against the deadly zombies.

Controls:
WASD or ARROW KEYS - move
Mouse 1 - Shoot
F - Open/Close Shop

Goal: 
Survive for as long as possible.
